short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Basic keyboard controls for the Skillshare player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Available video controls:
• Left/Right keys     - Backward/Forward
• Up/Down keys      - Volume up/down
• Space                     - Pause/Play
• M                             - Toggle mute
• T                              - Toggle Theater Mode
• Shift + P                 - Play previous video on playlist
• Shift + N                 - Play next video on playlist
• <                              - Slow down the video
• >                              - Speed up the video
• Home/End             - Beginning/End of video
• 0-9                           - Set time to (number + 0) % , e.g. 10%
• F                               - Full-screen
• Double-click video - Full-screen

Source code: https://github.com/avi12/skillshare-player-control
